thread.title: Brooklyn Beckham enjoys a night out amid David's scandal | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Brooklyn Beckham enjoys a night out amid David's scandal | Daily Mail Online

author: Jj Nattrass For Mailonline
title: Brooklyn Beckham enjoys a night out amid David's scandal | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 128 shares Having inherited his parents' impeccable fashion sense, Brooklyn cut a seriously chic figure on his night out. Teaming a monochrome floral shirt with a pair of black jeans, the teenager was certainly dressed to impress. The truth is out? His jaunt into Mayfair came after his family hit the headlines after a series of scandalous emails from his father (pictured) to members of his team were leaked He ensured he put on a well-healed display by slipping on a pair of stone suede Chelsea boots. Once again, he borrowed some inspiration from his father and threw on a camel sheerling-lined jacket to keep the cold at bay, and donned a flat cap. Brooklyn looked to be trying to keep a relatively low-profile as he enjoyed a night out, however, the teen has not been afraid to keep his Instagram followers up-to-date with his movements. Nothing's gonna stand in his way: Undeterred the 17-year-old student and photographer appeared to be keeping a fashionable yet low-key profile as he headed to MNKY HSE Earlier on in the day he'd hit the gym for a workout and shared a snap of his gym-session with his 9.2million followers. The past seven days haven't been the easiest for the teen or hi family, as his father David has seen his golden reputation lose its gleaming shine, thanks to an email leak. In the emails David reacted angrily when he found out he had been passed over for a knighthood. Still being sociable: Earlier on in the day he'd hit the gym for a workout and shared a snap of his gym-session with his 9.2million followers Beckileaks: The past seven days haven't been the easiest for the teen or hi family, as his father David has seen his golden reputation lose its gleaming shine, thanks to an email leak The former England captain branded the Honours Committee ‘unappreciative c***s’ and dismissed lower awards, ranting: ‘Unless it’s a knighthood f*** off’. According to the revelations, the Honours Committee had already agreed that Beckham's nomination – almost certainly proposed by his PR advisers – was well 'merited' before a routine check of his tax affairs. The leaked emails also include a number of bombshells and series of sweary-rants and may even have been used as part of a £1million blackmail plot. In one electronic missive the ex-England captain allegedly claims singer Katherine Jenkins, 36, got an OBE for ‘singing at the rugby and going to see the troops plus taking coke. F g joke’. Not quite the happy chap: In the emails David reacted angrily when he found out he had been passed over for a knighthood Share or comment on this article 128
